lead_paragraph: Carl P. Paladino, the Republican nominee for governor, and Fredric U. Dicker, a political editor and reporter for The New York Post, got into a loud argument on Wednesday.
snippet: Carl P. Paladino, the Republican nominee for governor, and Fredric U. Dicker, a political editor and reporter for The New York Post, got into a loud argument on Wednesday.

headline.main: ‘I Want to Know Why You Sent Your Goons After My Daughter’
headline.seo: ‘I Want to Know Why You Sent Goons After My Daughter’
headline.print_headline: ‘I Want to Know Why You Sent Your Goons After My Daughter’
